Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy

Interface GameObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
Boss, Bubble, CeilingUnit, Enemy, EnemyProjectile, Fire, FloorUnit, Fruit, GameChar, GameProp, GoldCoin, Gravity, Hero, HeroProjectile, LandformsUnit, PlatformUnit, Projectile, WallUnit
public interface GameObject
GameObject interface define some methods for game object properties
